channel.title: CVE Feed for Mark Steadman -- Podiant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mark Steadman -- Podiant

item.title: CVE-2024-44016|2024-10-05T11:01:01.163Z -- mark%20steadman -- podiant
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Mark Steadman Podiant allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Podiant: from n/a through 1.1.
